name: Order Approval for MultiVendorX
author: Sevengits

sections.description:
The Order Approval for MultiVendorX plugin allows vendors to review and either accept or reject customer orders before processing any payments. This feature is made possible by combining the MultiVendorX plugin with the SG Order Approval plugin. With this plugin, you can easily manage orders from multiple vendors while ensuring that payments are not collected from customers until the orders are approved by the vendors.

The benefits of using the Order Approval feature for the MultiVendorX plugin are:

  • Improved order management: With this feature, vendors have greater control over the orders they receive and can choose to accept or reject them based on their availability or other factors.

  • Increased customer satisfaction: By allowing vendors to review orders before payment is processed, customers can be assured that their orders will be fulfilled by the vendor of their choice, which can lead to greater satisfaction and repeat business.

  • Reduced payment issues: The Order Approval feature ensures that payment is not collected from customers until their orders have been approved by the vendors. This helps to reduce payment-related issues that may arise from canceled orders or delayed shipments.

Overall, the Order Approval feature can help to streamline the order management process for vendors and improve the customer experience, leading to greater success for the multi-vendor marketplace.Multiple vendor order management is one of the key feature.

Order Approval for MultivendorX Plugin [Premium]

  • All features of Free version.
  • Enable order approval for specific products.
  • Translation ready.
  • Emails support.

Buy Premium|Docs|Demo

Checkout Other ORDER APPROVAL Plugin and Addons

  • Order Approval for Woocommerce Free version & Premium
  • Dokan Order Approval Free version & Premium
  • Order Approval for WCFM Free version & Premium
sections.installation:
To install plugin, follow these steps:

Log in to your WordPress dashboard.
Click on “Plugins” in the left-hand menu.
Click on “Add New.”
In the search bar, type “Order approval for Order Approval for MultiVendorX” and search.
Alternatively, you can download the plugin from wordpress.org and upload it manually to your WordPress site by going to “Plugins” -> “Add New” -> “Upload Plugin.”
When you find / upload the plugin, click on “Install Now.”
Once the plugin is installed, click on “Activate.”
sections.faq:
Will it work with all payment gateways such as paypal, stripe etc.

The Multi-vendor order processing plugin has been designed to work with all Woocommerce payment gateways. If you are facing any troubles please contact us via support.

Will it take customer card details while ordering?

No. Customer can make an order without any payment. Later on approval on order they can make payment.
